Description: 

A new milestone in the history of vampire hunters 
creatures of darkness and a new stage in the history 
of the famous series Castlevania. When was the end of 
time, the Earth was at the mercy of the forces of darkness 
and the mysterious Lords of Shadow. Countries ravaged by 
wandering souls of the dead who can not find peace, and 
mysterious creatures have sown death and destruction 
among the survivors. The player will become a Gabriel - one 
of the knights of the Brotherhood of Light, an organization 
of holy warriors to protect humanity from the forces of evil. 
His wife fell victim to the creatures of darkness, but her 
soul is laid to rest. Realizing that the danger looming over 
the world, she took the right decision - to send Gabriel on 
the path to salvation of mankind.

A new chapter. Legendary Castlevania series has found 
a new form due to the studio Mercury Steam. Great graphics, 
addictive gameplay and an intriguing storyline will please 
both novices and fans of the original game. 
The star cast. In the development of the game involved 
Hideo Kojima - the creator of the iconic Metal Gear. 
Give voice to the role of famous actors: Robert Carlyle 
(Robert Carlyle), Patrick Stewart (Patrick Stewart), 
Jason Isaacs (Jason Isaacs) and Natasha McElhone (Natascha McElhone). 
Holy cross. In combat against the creatures of darkness 
Gabriel uses a special Battle Cross - a unique multi-functional 
weapon that can be converted into a silver stake and whip. 
In addition, the vampire hunter arsenal includes four dozen 
combat combos. Abroad darkness. Explore the vast and varied 
world of games, battle terrifying monsters and their minions. 
Gabriel path will pass through 50 fully three-dimensional 
game zones, where it will not withstand more than 45 types 
of enemies.
